content.rendered:
VPNs are one of the hottest categories of apps in the Google Play Store. There are hundreds of Android VPNs to choose from, but which ones are actually safe to use and will get the job done? In this article, we’ll outline our top picks for highly secure & trusted VPN apps. 

What’s a VPN?

VPN stands for a virtual private network. A virtual private network is a completely private network that encrypts and transmits data as it bounces from one place to another online. Now in simple terms, downloading a VPN app and using it to connect to the internet allows you to browse the web or use your phone securely.  

What are the Best VPN Apps? 

Here are our top three picks for top VPN apps, in no particular order:

NordVPN 

NordVPN is the world’s number one VPN app and is trusted & recommended by major tech companies such as CNET and is used by over 10 Million people. What makes the app stand out is it’s blazing fast connection. NordVPN has a next-generation protocol called NordLynx, which makes for the most ideal user experience. 

Features: 

  • Encryption
  • VPN protocols: OpenVPN, NordLynx based on WireGuard 
  • Unlimited data  
  • 5500+ servers worldwide  
  • Protection of 6 devices with a single account
  • Double VPN for ultimate privacy
  • VPN auto-connect  
  • 24/7 customer support

Express VPN

Express VPN is a virtual private network engineered to protect your privacy and security. It’s regarded by millions as one of the easiest and simplest VPN apps to use. You can browse the internet safely and anonymously in just a few taps. It also comes with a 7-day free trial so you can see what all the hype is for yourself! 

Features: 

  • Unlimited speed and bandwidth
  • Stream or download anything
  • Encrypted
  • Compatible with Windows, Mac, iOS, Android, Linux, routers, smart TVs, and more 
  • 24/7 customer service

VPN Free

VPN Betternet is a free and unlimited virtual private network for all Android devices. Trusted by over 50 Million people, Betternet VPN hides your IP address, encrypts your online usage, converts public Wi-Fi into your very own private network and helps unblock sites and apps on your Android device so that you can browse, download, watch, read, etc. anything online anonymously.  

Features: 

  • Unblock websites & apps
  • Anonymously connect to the internet 
  • Secure any device
  • Extremely fast speeds
  • Shield WiFi hotspot

Unlock an Extra Layer of Privacy!

Cover allows you to hide pictures by locking them in a secret vault on your Android device. Cover, the ultimate secret photo & video vault app is another great security tool to consider as well as a VPN.

Try it for free today!
